page.title: 08RECREATION SPORTS CLUBS
page.content: NARBERTH RUGBY CLUB IS IN SPRING GARDENS IT COMBINED WITH THE CRICKET CLUB. BEHIND SALMONS DRANG IS THE SOCCER CLUB. THERE ARE FOUR FOOTBALL TEAMS THE 1ST AND 2ND SENIOR TEAMS, THE UNDER 16S AND THE UNDER 14S.THE CRICKET CLUB IS NEAR THE RUGBY GROUND RUGBY IS ONLY PLAYED IN THE WINTER. IN THE SUMMER CRICKET IS PLAYED INSTEAD OF RUGBY.THERE ARE THREE RUGBY TEAMS THE FIRSTS,SECONDS AND YOUTH THE COLOURS OF THE FIRST 15 ARE BLUE AND NAVY.THE RUGBY IS CALLED THE OTTERS. THERE IS A PITCH IN CLYDERWEN AS WELL AS IN NARBERTH. HOCKEY IS PLAYED IN THE SECONDARY SCHOOL. OTHER GAMES ARE PLAYED IN THE BLOOMFIELD COMMUNITY CENTRE.
